channel.title: Ask the Oracle - Official Podcast for the Ironsworn RPG
channel.description:
I've started putting out a weekly podcast dedicated to my free small press RPG. The first two episodes, available now, are dedicated to world creation and character creation for the two-player, GM-less campaign which we'll undertake in future episodes.
Available at https://ironsworn.podbean.com/, and (hopefully) on your preferred podcast app.
Mad respect to all of the Gauntlet podcasters. Holy cow, is it a bunch of work.
